short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension plugin allows for fast forward and rewind in one-second increments on YouTube using the mouse wheel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension enhances the YouTube viewing experience by enabling precise video navigation. Once installed, users can simply hover their mouse cursor over the video that's currently playing on YouTube. By scrolling the mouse wheel upwards or downwards, the extension allows the video to be fast-forwarded or rewound in one-second increments. This feature provides users with a more granular level of control over their video playback, making it easier to skip through content or revisit specific moments without the hassle of using the standard playback controls.
